OOC: Solely because of his mental powers, I might point out.  
Everyone's going to be affected differently by these globes of power, 
so there's no basing subsequent encounters on this one.

Oblivious to everything, Empath follows the whispering voices into 
the mountains ...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> OOC:  Alrighty.  Cool.  Yay, Skulletron is capable of activating 
the Vok treasures!
